title.narrative: TCS-other 1:Number and Percentage of ART patients receiving Adherence support
Percentage of TG that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of TG reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of adults and children that initiated ART, with an undetectable viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
Number of needles and syringes distributed per person who injects drugs per year by needle and syringe programs
